amendment.description: To provide for a study of waivers of certain cost-sharing requirements of the Department of Energy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3203 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3203 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 2953.
